name: Jingle Bell Bombs
description:
It's Christmas time and evil Jack Frost is here to ruin the holiday by dropping ornaments stuffed with bombs. Stop him with Santa's magical bag of goodies and save Christmas.

NEW FOR 2014
* Ever Increasing Challenging Waves
* Leaderboard and achievements
* Evil Jack Frost nemesis
* Holiday fun
* Ice bomb explosion effects
* Glass ornament bombs
* Christmas themed
* Dynamic holiday music
* Easy finger drag controls
* Pine tree bumpers
* Fun and addicting gameplay
* Great for all ages
* Flying Santa with reindeer
* Physics by Nvidia
* Made with Unity
